button.description: Click this button to enable PayPal and select it as default in the selected Sales Channel
button.label: Set PayPal as default

swag-paypal.messageNotBlank: This value should not be blank.

clientId.label: Client ID
clientId.tooltipText: The REST API client ID is used to authenticate this plugin with the PayPal API.

clientSecret.label: Client secret
clientSecret.tooltipText: The REST API client secret is used to authenticate this plugin with the PayPal API.

clientIdSandbox.label: Sandbox client ID
clientIdSandbox.tooltipText: The REST API client ID is used while testing to authenticate this plugin with the PayPal API.

clientSecretSandbox.label: Sandbox client secret
clientSecretSandbox.tooltipText: The REST API client secret is used while testing to authenticate this plugin with the PayPal API.

sandbox.label: Enable sandbox
sandbox.tooltipText: Enable if you want to test the PayPal integration.

button.title: Get API credentials
button.messageFetchedError: Try again or enter your credentials manually.

submitCart.label: Submit cart
submitCart.helpText: If this option is active, cart data will be submitted to PayPal at checkout.

brandName.label: Your own brand name on PayPal page
brandName.tooltipText: This text will be displayed as the brand name on the PayPal payment page.

helpText.login: Login: The PayPal site displays a login screen as landing page.
helpText.billing: Registration: The PayPal site displays a registration form as landing page.
helpText.no_preference: No preference: PayPal decides which page is shown, depending on the previous interaction of the customer with PayPal.

sendOrderNumber.label: Submit order number
sendOrderNumber.helpText: If this option is active, the order number will be submitted to PayPal as invoice ID at checkout.

orderNumberPrefix.label: Order number prefix
orderNumberPrefix.tooltipText: This text is placed before the original order number (e.g MyShop_SW20001). This helps to identify the shop where the payment was made. You can find it as invoice ID in your PayPal dashboard.

orderNumberSuffix.label: Order number suffix
orderNumberSuffix.tooltipText: This text is placed after the original order number (e.g SW20001_MyShop). This helps to identify the shop where the payment was made. You can find it as invoice ID in your PayPal dashboard.

loggingLevel.label: Debugging
loggingLevel.tooltipText: When using advanced debugging, additional data is recorded during checkout to detect potential errors. For temporary use only.

ecsDetailEnabled.label: 'Pay now' on detail page:
ecsDetailEnabled.helpText: If this option is active, the Express Checkout button will be shown on each product detail page.

ecsCartEnabled.label: 'Pay now' on cart:
ecsCartEnabled.helpText: If this option is active, the Express Checkout button will be shown on the cart.

ecsOffCanvasEnabled.label: 'Pay Now' on Off-Canvas cart:
ecsOffCanvasEnabled.helpText: If this option is active, the Express Checkout button will be shown on the Off-Canvas cart.

ecsLoginEnabled.label: 'Pay Now' on login page:
ecsLoginEnabled.helpText: If this option is active, the Express Checkout button will be shown on the login and register page.

ecsListingEnabled.label: 'Pay now' on listing pages:
ecsListingEnabled.helpText: If this option is active, the Express Checkout button will be shown on listing pages.

ecsSubmitCart.label: Submit cart
ecsSubmitCart.helpText: If this option is active, the cart will be submitted to PayPal for Express orders.

ecsButtonLanguageIso.label: Button locale:
ecsButtonLanguageIso.helpText: If not set, the sales channel language will be used.

spb.cardTitle: PayPal Checkout with Smart Payment Buttons

spbButtonLanguageIso.label: Button locale:
spbButtonLanguageIso.helpText: If not set, the sales channel language will be used.

spbAlternativePaymentMethodsEnabled.label: Enable the alternative payment methods for the Smart Payment Buttons.
spbAlternativePaymentMethodsEnabled.helpText: Alternative payment methods are, Creditcards, Invoice and more.

spbShowPayLater.label: Display Pay Later as separate button

plus.introduction:
PayPal PLUS: Your complete all-in-one payment solution including PayPal, Direct Debit, Credit Card and Pay Upon Invoice. PayPal PLUS offers your customers full flexibility in choosing their preferred payment method. Your advantages as a seller? Easier accounting with only one contracting party, one account and one transaction overview showing all incoming payments. You receive your money directly after customers complete the order process.
You can apply for PayPal PLUS here. Apply for Payment upon Invoice here.
plus.hint: Note: PayPal PLUS only works with the payment acquisition "Sale". It will be set automatically.

infobox.text: To see a list of valid locale codes click

error.detail: The locale code you provided doesn't match the format required by PayPal. A valid format is "en_GB".

settingForm.messageSaveSuccess: The PayPal settings have been saved.
settingForm.messageTestSuccess: The API credentials have been validated.
settingForm.messageTestError: The API credentials could not be validated.
settingForm.messageWebhookError: The webhook could not be saved. The following errors occurred:
